Body (HTML): Crafted from a heathered fabric that offers a stylish two-toned mottled appearance, these PGA TOUR golf shorts will keep you looking sharp out on the course. These men's shorts combine an active waistband featuring all-around stretch with flexible motion flux performance fabric that is engineered to give you the proper range of motion for both powerful swings and accurate puttin. To help prevent annoying end-of-day sunburns, the shorts are finished with sun flux protection that prevents uv rays from penetrating the fabric. Comfortable and versatile, these athletic shorts are equally suitable for casual lunches and get-togethers during the warmer months.

Title: Callaway Men's Opti-Stretch Front Solid Short
Body (HTML): You don't have to worry about pants that are too tight. With these solid shorts, you can focus on your game and bring your best all the way to the 18th green. Callaway's stretch technology and active waistband allow these pants to move with you, providing maximum comfort whether you end up in the sand, rough or fairway - or the water, but we don't expect you to dive in after your ball. Opti-Dri moisture wicking technology pulls sweat away from your body so you can cool down in the heat, Opti-Stretch with active waistband gives you the freedom to move unrestricted throughout your swing and Opti-Shield gives your skin superior protection against the sun's UV rays.

Title: Callaway Men's Big and Tall Opti-Stretch Front Cargo Short
Body (HTML): On the course, there's no such thing as having too many pockets. Your tees, golf balls, glove, scorecard and that lucky ball marker of yours will all fit into the pockets of our Callaway Big Tall cargo shorts. We put two subtle cargo pockets with a zipper closure on the outside and kept the traditional front-slit pockets and back pockets so you have six in total. Callaway's stretch technology and active waistband allow these pants to move with you, providing maximum comfort. Opti-Dri moisture wicking technology pulls sweat away from your body so you can cool down in the heat, Opti-Stretch gives you the freedom to move unrestricted throughout your swing and Opti-Shield gives your skin superior protection against the sun's UV rays.

Title: Royal and Awesome Men's Golf Shorts
Body (HTML): Men's Royal Awesome shorts these Royal Awesome King of diamonds golf shorts are fit for golfing royalty and the loud design is a great talking point out on the links. These funky shorts have a multi-colored design and feature blue, green, red and yellow diamonds on a white background. Importantly they are 97 percent cotton and 3 percent spandex making them breathable, comfortable and durable. The really awesome thing about these shorts is they are designed with golf in mind and include tee loops and a tour slit and come with a free golf (and beer tool) to give you guys even greater value for money. king of diamond apparel includes shorts, pitch mark repairer which doubles up as a bottle opener! Royal Awesome whether its your annual golf tour, the corporate Jolly, your club championship final or spending that 'quality time' with your father-in-law, these spectacular shorts will ensure you make an impact on the course and in the bar. This apparel is exclusively made for royal and awesome. Returns our funky king of diamond design comes with our famous no quibble 30 day money guarantee, please just follow the return item process in amazon where our colleagues at amazon will handle your full return from start to finish, all that we ask is you return the apparel in an as sold conditions with all outer packaging and tags enclosed. How do i wash, dry and iron these you can machine wash our products at 40 Degree and it is best to wash colors separately. Ironing is also fine, apart from being a bit tedious. You can tumble dry them but this will result in slight shrinking (1 2 inch in the waist and 1 inch in the leg). they will return to the original size when ironed.
